description: This is a Java source file implementing move validation logic for a chess engine. It provides methods for generating legal moves, verifying move legality, and checking king safety, including handling basic move types, captures, promotions, and castling. It does not support en passant. The class 'MoveValidator' serves as a core component for move legality checking within the chess backend.

classes.name: MoveValidator
classes.description: Class responsible for generating and validating chess moves, including move legality checks, move generation per piece, and king safety verification.

methods.name: generateLegalMoves
methods.description: Generates all legal moves for the given side on the provided board, filtering out illegal moves that leave the king in check.

methods.name: isLegalMove
methods.description: Determines if a specific move is legal considering the move rules and king safety.

methods.name: isKingInCheck
methods.description: Checks if the specified color's king is currently under attack.
